ygData.subject: Re: Gnomestock '99
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The first time I got et by a Fire Elemental about 3 feet from the ledge.  The second time, however, I made it all the way.  And yes, Dark Elves have no
ygData.messageBody:
At 07:29 PM 11/29/99 -0800, you wrote:

>I actually managed to make it to the Temple of Solusek Ro ledge, where I
>was able to fling myself into the lava along with perhaps twenty others
>that I saw up there. There was, sadly, a fair amount of attrition along
>the way (not unexpected). I tried to get back two more times, but kept
>getting chomped by piranhas in the Nektulos river.


The first time I got et by a Fire Elemental about 3 feet from the
ledge. The second time, however, I made it all the way. And yes, Dark
Elves have no sense of Humour.

We should do this again sometime...

GnoTalies
